summary: This bill, the "Stop Stealing our Chips Act," amends the Export Control Reform Act of 2018 to create a whistleblower incentive program and protections for whistleblowers reporting violations of U.S. export control laws. It establishes a secure online portal for reporting, offers financial awards to whistleblowers based on the value of the information leading to fines, and prohibits employer retaliation against whistleblowers. The bill also establishes an Export Compliance Accountability Fund to finance whistleblower awards and program administration. Finally, it makes a conforming amendment to the Victims of Crime Act of 1984.
